compliant.legal provisions: Representatives of controllers or processors not established in the Union

non_compliant.section: By using the Service, you acknowledge that any Personal Data about you, regardless of whether provided by you or obtained from a third party, is being provided to IFTTT in the U.S. and will be hosted on U.S. servers, and you authorize IFTTT to transfer, store and process your information to and in the U.S., and possibly other countries.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for data transfer to the U.S., such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) or adequacy decisions. Provide details about the safeguards in place to protect personal data during and after the transfer.

non_compliant.section: This entire section lacks details about data subject rights.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: Include information about user rights like access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection to processing. Explain how users can exercise these rights.
